summary: so my dad took me to interactive introverts and now he likes to do this... dad: go outside. me: ok, in a minute. dad: just...
body:
so my dad took me to interactive introverts and now he likes to do this…

dad: go outside.

me: ok, in a minute.

dad: just because dan and phil spend their whole lives inside doesn’t mean you can.

blog.name: moonchair
blog.title: from the stars.
blog.description:
atori (❛◡❛✿)
25 and struggling young adult

body:
Phan Oneshot #3

Internet Friends #2


DAN POV


sadie65 and 3 others: just commented your text post

troyjackson: just reblogged your chat story

amazingphil: just sent you a message

amazingphil: started following you


I just woke up and slowly unplugged my phone from the charger. i turned him on and started scrolling all the notifications. Nothing new.

I was just about to put down my phone but then I saw two more notifications from my Tumblr. Two more notifications that made me feel the happiest person in the world. Amazingphil followed me and replied to my message.

I quickly slide the notification opening my app.


amazingphil: hey, oh my god that’s so sweet I really appreciate it. I’d love too give you some advices, now I’m pretty tired but ill contact you tomorrow. Maybe we would FaceTime sometime or something. And also, who knows, maybe you’ll meet me one day ;)


Maybe that’s stupid and pathetic but I actually started crying. The person, the only person I truly loved, who was always making me smile and even for a minute making me feel less alone and depressed wanted to meet me. Wanted to FaceTime me, wanted to give me some advices and maybe even meet me some day. For the first time in a long time I was that happy and touched.

I took a deep breath and let my heart calm down.

Okay so I can’t text him anything like “omg I cant believe it, you replied me omgggggg” because that’s just stupid and terrifying.

I opened my keyboard, wrote a message and sent it.


danisnotonfire: no problem :) I’m so happy you’re going to teach me some editing advices. Cant’t wait. And yeah, I hope we will meet some day :D


I barely left Tumblr when I got the notification that Phil texted me back.


amazingphil: can you give me your Skype please?


I smiled softly and texted:


danisnotonfire: yeah sure. It’s danisnotonfire9


Two minutes later I got a notification from Skype that user amazingphil11 added me to his contacts.

I accepted it and left the app. I went back on tumblr and opened my messages.


amazingphil: cool I just added you :) also whatta hell?? What is that picture on your Skype profile picture? You look so cute in it holding this teddy bear hahah


I swear my heart almost jumped out of my chest. Did he just called me cute?


danisnotonfire: hahah yeah I need to change it


amazinghil: noo! It’s adorable, you can’t change it. Leave it okay?


danisnotonfire: um…okay :-;


amazingphil: cool :D I’ll call you in about an hour


Well I needed to go to school but I guess I can stay in my room for today so I just replied:


danisnotonfire: okay :)

body:
Phan Oneshot #2

2009


Internet friends #1



Phil POV


youtubetoast11: just liked your text

heyimkatie8 and 54 others: just commented your photo

pandasim: just sent you a message

dolly765: just sent you a message

sadboy9 and 6 others: just liked you photo

danisnotonfire: just sent you a message


You have three unread messages on Tumblr. Click here to…


heyimkatie8: hey I love, would you please be your husband?


You: im sorry, im a lonely wolf Katie hahah, love you too :)


pandasim: omg im so thankful for you. My life sucks and I mean that but you always makes me laugh and feel less sad and terrible, I love you so much


You: im so happy to hear that :) also I hope it will get better and you will be okay, remember you’re great, love you too, have a good day :D


danisnotonfire: um…hey, I just wanted to tell you that your account is amazing and I’m also watching your videos on youtube, you’re great. I’d love to meet you one day…maybe. You probably won’t see this anyway but if you’d ever have some time and want to teach me and give some editing advices I would be the happiest o. Earth. Well, thats it I guess.


You: hey, oh my god that’s so sweet I really appreciate it. Id love too give you some advices, now im pretty tired but ill contact you tomorrow. Maybe we would FaceTime sometime or something. And also, who knows, maybe you’ll meet me one day ;)

body:
Phan Oneshot #1

find more on my wattpad: sadcoconutmilk


2009

PINOF1 what happened after a cuddle?


DAN POV


-This was the most fun I’ve ever had - I said looking shyly on the floor. I was sure that Phil is going to ask the next question or maybe just already end this video but he literally quickly turned himself back at the camera and jumped at me closing me in a hug. I screamed gently and started laughing pretending that this is just the funny thing best friends just…do.

I looked at him and saw his beautiful face smiling at me. God he was the cutest human I’ve ever seen.

His face was very close to mine, our noses were almost touching, I could feel his breath carous my skin. I felt like I wasn’t breathing, like we weren’t recording any youtube video right now, the world just stopped and gave us the infinity to just hug and starring at each other. We were lying like that a couple of minutes and I didn’t even noticed when Phil’s smile has been smashed of and he was looking at me seriously and honestly, it was sweet and terrifying at the same time.

-Phil….- I said quietly trying to calm my breath. I noticed that whole this time he was looking at my mouth. I was breathing heavily having no idea what’s happening to me.

Phil bite his lip and moved his eyes a little higher. Now he was looking at my eyes and I swear my heart stopped working for a second. Now it was beating as fast as it could trying to get out of my chest. Blood was pulsing loudly and angrily in my head and I liked it. He was starring at me and I was starring at him drowning in his deep blue eyes, feeling like I’m on the ocean and nothing matters.

He moved his head closer to mine and one second later there was no space between us. He touched my lips with his, softly and slowly like he was afraid I was going to break apart any second. I closed my eyes and was just enjoying a few of this wonderful seconds the we were just tying there, kissing and hugging like the world doesn’t exist.

I opened my eyes and carefully licked my lip still feeling his strawberry smell and vanilla taste.

He looked at me smiling and after a while we both were laughing and smiling.

-God, you’re so amazing - I said finally sitting down.

-Well, you are too but more - he smiled and sat next to me.

-We should end th…um…- I started mumbling but I was so embarrassed, confused and happy at the same time that I just couldn’t say a word.

-Yeah - he said quietly. He was smiling softly and his cheeks turned red and I swear the god this was the cutest thing ever.

We looked at each other for the last time and then turned our heads t the camera and ended the video.

reblog.comment:
Phan Oneshot #1

find more on my wattpad: sadcoconutmilk

Phan Oneshot #1

find more on my wattpad: sadcoconutmilk


2009

PINOF1 what happened after a cuddle?


DAN POV


-This was the most fun I’ve ever had - I said looking shyly on the floor. I was sure that Phil is going to ask the next question or maybe just already end this video but he literally quickly turned himself back at the camera and jumped at me closing me in a hug. I screamed gently and started laughing pretending that this is just the funny thing best friends just…do.

I looked at him and saw his beautiful face smiling at me. God he was the cutest human I’ve ever seen.

His face was very close to mine, our noses were almost touching, I could feel his breath carous my skin. I felt like I wasn’t breathing, like we weren’t recording any youtube video right now, the world just stopped and gave us the infinity to just hug and starring at each other. We were lying like that a couple of minutes and I didn’t even noticed when Phil’s smile has been smashed of and he was looking at me seriously and honestly, it was sweet and terrifying at the same time.

-Phil….- I said quietly trying to calm my breath. I noticed that whole this time he was looking at my mouth. I was breathing heavily having no idea what’s happening to me.

Phil bite his lip and moved his eyes a little higher. Now he was looking at my eyes and I swear my heart stopped working for a second. Now it was beating as fast as it could trying to get out of my chest. Blood was pulsing loudly and angrily in my head and I liked it. He was starring at me and I was starring at him drowning in his deep blue eyes, feeling like I’m on the ocean and nothing matters.

He moved his head closer to mine and one second later there was no space between us. He touched my lips with his, softly and slowly like he was afraid I was going to break apart any second. I closed my eyes and was just enjoying a few of this wonderful seconds the we were just tying there, kissing and hugging like the world doesn’t exist.

I opened my eyes and carefully licked my lip still feeling his strawberry smell and vanilla taste.

He looked at me smiling and after a while we both were laughing and smiling.

-God, you’re so amazing - I said finally sitting down.

-Well, you are too but more - he smiled and sat next to me.

-We should end th…um…- I started mumbling but I was so embarrassed, confused and happy at the same time that I just couldn’t say a word.

-Yeah - he said quietly. He was smiling softly and his cheeks turned red and I swear the god this was the cutest thing ever.

We looked at each other for the last time and then turned our heads t the camera and ended the video.
